replies.body:
There are more pictures in the replies to that. Here they are.

https://i.imgur.com/QEIz2wY.png[]
https://i.imgur.com/Xd5oJKQ.png[]

Looks this is our non-humanoid champion Reav3 mentioned a while back. Kind of expected it, honestly.

But, like...
Is the book magical, and is she riding on it to get around?

It looks like she's riding on it!

She looks so cute! I'm hoping this leak isn't fake. Plus it's nice to have a non-humanoid Champion that isn't all monstrous!

Another new image.

https://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=https%3A%2F%2Fuploads.disquscdn.com%2Fimages%2Ff7acb279e0c9d08cc33824330549c4739899d8d3052be38344bcc61fdfdd9748.png%3Fw%3D800%26amp%3Bh%3D288&key=f0abbd34f14549f3a15cd94dd9970851&width=425&height=800

Looks like the joke animation.

OMG SHE LITERALLY HAS HER FACE IN BREAD

SHE IS DEFINITELY A CAT LMAO

Yep.

Also, the book appears to have the Bandle City crest on it. Perhaps she's connected to that realm somehow. I don't think she herself is a Yordle, though, unless she's a different "species" like Fizz. I don't think that's likely, though. We just have to wait and see.

It's still possible to get some Bandle City lore out of this I guess.

Despite the cute factor though am I wrong to think its a bit artistically lazy to give us a cat. I mean there are ways to make cats visually interesting and this one has some neat accents like the lantern thingy on its head and the gold whiskers and such.... but at the end of the day Riot is gonna give us a plain housecat as a champion? I think the Summon: Aery VFX is more visually interesting and thats just an Rune lol

I actually like them making a cat Champion, because most non-humanoid Champions are very monstrous and scary, and usually not very cute or morally good. So I think this is something pretty new and original for them.

And I definitely hope they give us more yordle lore!
I wouldn't say that a cat shaped cat is lazy. League is basically just humanoids and monsters in silhouette design. A cat riding on a book is actually kinda new and exciting.

> [{quoted}](name=mrmeddyman,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=XtK5BEp7,comment-id=000300000000000000000001,timestamp=2019-04-24T23:50:12.063+0000)
>
> It's still possible to get some Bandle City lore out of this I guess.
> 
> Despite the cute factor though am I wrong to think its a bit artistically lazy to give us a cat. I mean there are ways to make cats visually interesting and this one has some neat accents like the lantern thingy on its head and the gold whiskers and such.... but at the end of the day Riot is gonna give us a plain housecat as a champion? I think the Summon: Aery VFX is more visually interesting and thats just an Rune lol

not just a plain housecat. a cute adorable kitten with magical superpowahs. its perfect.

Yeah, I think you're right. Your explanations sounds pretty logical.

It all sounds super interesting! Can't wait to find more about her.
https://i.giphy.com/media/L9kwXOK00OJGM/200.gif?nodirect

“She”?

If this new champion is a yordle, then it is male.  Male yordles are furred, females are not.
The enchanter support was confirmed to be female by Riot in the newest Roadmap.
In the teaser, the book had a portal...is that perhaps her recall or her joke/taunt?

Maybe.
Or maybe the teaser is just a hint as to where she came from. She looks like some sort of spirit or something to me, so maybe she's from another realm and she came here through a portal, like the Yordles do from Bandle City. Hell, for all we know, she could be something from that realm.

EDIT: WAIT!
THE BANDLE CITY CREST IS ON THE BOOK FROM THE LOOKS OF IT.

Wait so I was right on the bandle city portal in the book but wrong in that it is a yordle.  Still happy to be wrong.

ITS A FUCKING KITTEN.

I really wish people didn't do this, though.
Like, probably the best part of a new champion is the reveal. Shit like this ruins the surprise.
Some people prefer leaks. I personally find the wait for the reveal annoying

Still, why leak it on _this_ level. I don't mind a leaked image or something, but this leak is a bit much. A lot of images of her in game, plus the video thumbnail that shows her ability icons and possibly her splash.

Same reason the Akali VGU was leaked. 

An accident, and the person at fault feels absolutely horrible for doing it. 
The gameplay video was recorded, likely from Riot HQ, and accidentally uploaded and almost instantly removed. But not before screengrabs happened, although only snippets were recovered.
I mean why click on the thread if you don't want to see leaks?

It happens on accident some of the time though. Like this is supposedly from someone that went to Riot only a few days ago through the Partner program and recorded the video that you see in the thumbnail and they uploaded it without setting it to Private.
Upon further thought, she looks a lot like a alignment and gender-swapped {{champion:45}}; possible family connection?
Veigar finally got Lulu pregnant . . . .
Not the angle I had in mind, more of a possible sister
This is truly tragic. ITS NOT A YORDLE WAAAAH

None of their appearances are completely uniform; the only ones that got an appearance overhaul were {{champion:18}} and {{champion:78}}.  If anything, this looks like a female variant of {{champion:17}} with their eyes actually open.

Edit: Should also note {{champion:45}} is basically a black cat under that hat as well

It's more then likely a new type of Yordle that hasn't been seen yet..considering there was also a Tweet from Riot that says "[Going to Bandle City](https://twitter.com/RiotAshekandi/status/1121164180428480512)" which is where Yordles come from.
A kitten named Yummy? Is this Maplestory?

What.
I'm gonna die.
That's so cute please tell me its real.
I have never been more happy to be wrong if this is real.  Flat out I will squeal if this is real.

There is still a very small chance that she is a Yordle. She could be a very, very different "species" of Yordle, like Fizz is. I say this because the cover of the book in one of the leaked images has the Bandle City crest.

Still, I think its more likely that she is a spirit from that realm. We just have to wait and see, though.
I WANNA CUDDLE HER DONT MAKE ME WAIT ON THIS

SHE'S A CAAAAAAAAAT

I can already tell I'm going to LOVE this new Champion

Gosh I hope this is real
Kitty kitty! :D
Kitty cat! :D

Nyah cat! :D

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gc2UrGQ3W-8
:D

But in all seriousness, this champion "teaser" isn't just some fake hoax, right?

EDIT:
Okay, so I just saw the teaster in-client...this is going to be so great! :D
It's so adorable, I might die. I want it! {{sticker:sg-lux}}
https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UU-mnxXr8E4/V7-a56DHvhI/AAAAAAAAWU4/5ies6ZbF8Vs_GnjTCvfI9v7DPRrotJEmwCLcB/s1600/itssofluffy.jpg
haha yesss{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}} WANT!!!!

*sees "Neko" and misreads it as "Neeko"*

SCREEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a0nz9hde9q0

Just heard it's a support champion...
Before even seeing the abilities I can safely say it's gonna be a Pyke support situation
She is an enchanter so if anything she might be more like Rakan, highly mobile, low defenses, but is still mainly about protecting her team

Looks like a mobile version of Sona... Im pretty hype/scared. 

I havent been this excited for a champion release since ~~Annie's lore update~~ Zoe!!!!
She's an enchanter, so no.
YES! This is literally the best champion evuh. Say hello to my new MANE champion. :P
